pages.title: Azurite
pages.text: A rich blue ore, which, at a distance, can almost be mistaken for lapis. In its natural form it contains many impurities, which must first be removed, before it can be used.$(br2)It is found deep underground and seems to be able to intensify any Pigments energy.

pages.title: Refining Azurite
pages.text: Refining Azurite is not a cheap task.$(br)In this refined ingot form Azurite can be used for a lot more recipes.
